Line: Sorry, what I meant to say is, uh...
I've been sent... here... to help you move on...
I understand that I, uh, upset you, when I tried to touch the gate?
I really didn't uh... mean any harm.
But I would still like you to leave these grounds.
I'm... sorry but I don't think I can.
Can you tell me... who you are?
I was sent here to help you so, it would be nice if uh, you introduced yourself...?
I mean, I know we're in limbo, but like, where exactly? What's that gate over there for?
This used to be... This is the temple of my goddess.
Oh! My mom told me about her once! She's one of the old gods, right?
She said that people stopped worshipping her a long time ago, so not much is known about her.
I guess they call her the Goddess of the Hidden for a reason, haha!
